page.title: 01The hamlets around M.Risbro'
page.content: MONKS RISBOROUGH VILLAGE AND THE HAMLETS OF ASKETT,MEADLE,LITTLE KIMBLE,GREAT KIMBLE & ELLESBOROUGH The area is mainly flat,arable farmland growing barley and wheat.Cattle are also fattened on lush grassland. In the eastern part of the area the chilterns rise covered in light decidous woodland. The hamlets consist of a Church with surrounding flint or brick houses and cottages,many with black timber beams. Monks Risborough is a large village which has merged the ajoining town of Princes Risborough.Much of M.R. is new estates.Apart from a few Farming people most commute to London,Aylesbury, Etc. {P1-MR OLD VILLAGE P3&4 MR OLD SCHOOL P5-9-MR sport P10-14 MR Churches p15-19 MR Farming P20 Credits }
